verses.text: Mamin Jehová, ab' in lesal, cham wal ab'an tas swala'. Tak'wanh t'ayin, ina to te tojol ach, tzak'annhejelk'och tas tzala'.
Manh a k'anb'ej tas waj a in a checab' in tik, yujto malaj junok mach wach' yaj t'a a sat.
Ix in pechji b'eyek' yuj heb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin, ix in stek'anem heb' t'a sat lu'um. Ix in yak' cajnaj heb' t'a skal k’ik’ k’inal, icha wal yaj heb' chamnacxo.
Manhxo animaoc waj ticnaik swab'i, te somchajnac in k'ool.
Tzin nacot juntzanh k'ual ek'nac t'a peka', tzin naub'tanhan masanil tas a b'onac t'a yalanhtax chi'.
Ha t'ayach tzin mojb'ejk'e in k'ab', tzach in nib'ej wal, icha wal junok lum taquinh lu'um snib'an ha ha'.
Mamin Jehová, tak'wanh t'ayin t'a elanhchamel, toxo wal tz'el in k'ol swab'i. Manh a yaej a colwal t'ayin. Icha wal heb' chamnac smucchajemi, icham chi' ol in ajoc tato tza yaej a colwal t'ayin.
Ak' in nacot a wach'k'olal t'a junjun q'uinhib'alil, ina to a ach tzach wak'och yipoc in k'ool. Ch'ox t'ayin tas ol aj in b'eyb'ati, yujto wan in lesalwi t'ayach.
Mamin Jehová, colinel t'a yol sk'ab' heb' ajk'ool, yujto a t'ayach tzin say in colnab'il.
k'ayb'ej in yic tzin b'o icha tas tza nib'ej, yujto in Diosal ach. Aocab' Espíritu wach' tzin ik'an b'ey t'a a wach' b'eyb'al.
Mamin, manh in a cha chamoc, yic wach' max alchaj chukal lolonel t'ayach. Ik' in elta t'a skal wilk'olal, yujto wach' ach toni.
Yuj a wach'k'olal t'ayin, yuj chi' tza satcanel masanil heb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin, yujto a checab' in.
